project.description: Do a "platform" build from SVN. Do more testing than the matrix builds.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd squawk-native
$HUDSON_HOME/bin/verifyBuildJars2
java -jar build.jar clean java -jar build.jar copyphoneme java -jar build.jar java -jar build.jar -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata -lnt cldc imp debugger
java -jar build.jar map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite rm squawk.suite.map java -jar build.jar genspec java -jar build.jar jvmenv java -jar build.jar systemproperties java -jar build.jar Mnemonics java -jar build.jar OPC java -jar build.jar OperandStackEffect java -jar build.jar Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version $HUDSON_HOME/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING $HUDSON_HOME/bin/runiotests.sh
/usr/bin/rm -rf tempdoc java -jar build.jar makeapi squawk.suite.api cldc/preprocessed:imp/preprocessed:debugger/preprocessed tempdoc
ls -l > sizereport.txt
mkdir tmp cp squawk squawk.suite squawk.suite.metadata tmp java -jar build.jar clean mv tmp/squawk tmp/squawk.suite tmp/squawk.suite.metadata . rmdir tmp
java -jar build.jar clean
